name: next-lens
description: A CLI companion for Next.js App Router developers that scans API routes and provides quick insights from the terminal

scripts.build: pnpm run build:cli && pnpm run build:inspector
scripts.build:inspector: pnpm --filter @next-lens/inspector run build && pnpm run copy:inspector
scripts.copy:inspector: rm -rf dist/inspector-ui && mkdir -p dist/inspector-ui && cp -r ../../apps/inspector/dist/. dist/inspector-ui/

author: Yiwei Ho
